title: Lincoln's WARNING #100053: Market Crash Fears Rise
script: Market Crash Fears Rise? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below. Stop scrolling. Market Crash Fears Rise? They're selling you fear while pocketing profit. Classic misdirection. Now you know what they didn't want you to see. Support truth. Bitcoin below.
